STOMP.js Documentation » Index » Frame

Class: Frame

Defined in: src/stomp.coffee

Overview

Frame class represents a STOMP frame

See also:

  • STOMP Frame

Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(command, headers = {}, body = '', escapeHeaderValues = false)

Frame constructor. command, headers and body are available as properties.

Many of the Client methods pass instance of received Frame to the callback.

Parameters:

  • command ( String )
  • headers ( Object )
  • body ( String )
  • escapeHeaderValues ( Boolean )

    Quickly fuzzy find classes, mixins, methods, file:

    • T Open fuzzy finder dialog

    Control the navigation frame:

    • L Toggle list view
    • C Show class list
    • I Show mixin list
    • F Show file list
    • M Show method list
    • E Show extras list

    You can focus and blur the search input:

    • S Focus search input
    • Esc Blur search input
